text: Carphochaete schaffneri is a species of Mexican flowering plants in the sunflower family. They are native to San Luis Potosí in northeastern Mexico.Greenman, Jesse More 1904. Proceedings of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences 40: 34Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272. ==References== Category:Eupatorieae Category:Flora of San Luis Potosí Category:Plants described in 1904
title: Carphochaete schaffneri
